mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.BID, CATEGORY.ITEM, USER.NAME, BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.CONTENT, BOARD.DATE FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (UID, CID, TITLE, CONTENT, DATE) VALUES (${UID}, (SELECT CID FROM CATEGORY WHERE ITEM = #{ITEM}), #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, #{DATE})
mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD.BID, USER.NAME, CATEGORY.ITEM, BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.CONTENT, BOARD.DATE FROM BOARD
ORDER BY BOARD.BID desc, BOARD.DATE desc limit #{startPage}, #{perPageNum}

choose.when: WHERE CONTENT like '%${keyword}%' OR TITLE like '%${keyword}%'

mapper.sql: JOIN CATEGORY ON BOARD.CID = CATEGORY.CID JOIN USER ON BOARD.UID = USER.UID
